column4: im tryin to get ssh workin on my dell mini 9.  ive already got 1 server setup fine with publickeyauth as "yes" and pub key added.  but this ubuntu hardy on this mini isnt having it. keeps askin for the password..
ive even set the config to pubkeyauth NO, still wont accept the password..
you must generate the key pair on the client, then you ssh-copy-id to copy the public key to the server
try looking in /var/log/auth.log on the server
